participant_1.background:
My cats are my best friends.
I remember playing guitar with my friends in my basement for hours.
I do not do my laundry as often as I should.
i also enjoy reading novels by female authors and exploring new areas.
my favorite band is pearl jam.

participant_2.background:
I want to be able to combine my two passions, football and technology, by creating a wearable device that can track my performance on the pitch.
I met the love of my life while working at the hospital.
I'm a farmer who likes to pickle eggs and horseback ride in my spare time.
i hate evil.
my hobby is photography.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to pickle eggs and horseback ride. I also like to take photographs.
That sounds awesome! I like to read novels and play guitar.
I love reading! What are some of your favorite books?
I love reading novels by female authors. I recently read "The Great Gatsby" and "To Kill A Mockingbird".
I have read both of those books! They're both great. I also like to read books about history and science.
That's awesome! I love history and science too. What are some of your favorite books about those subjects?
I love the book "The Rise and Fall of the Third Reich" by William Shirer. It's a great book about the history of Nazi Germany.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good read.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I have to go now.
You too! Have a great day!
